frame.name: Subjective_temperature
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Experiencer</fen> senses different degrees of warmth that may or may not be related to the ambient temperature. The level of warmth is usually compared against the <fen>Experiencer</fen>'s subjective standard of comfort.
<ex><fex name="Body_part">My feet</fex> are <t>cold</t>.</ex> <ex>The fire will <m>keep</m> <fex name="Experiencer">you</fex> <t>warm</t>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Experiencer">I</fex>'<m>m</m> <fex name="Degree">too</fex> <t>hot</t> with this sweater on.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity which perceives a level of warmth.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>How much the actual feeling of temperature deviates from a certain level of warmth.</def-root>

FE.name: Body_part
FE.definition:
<def-root>A part of the body of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> in which the sensation of a temperature is located.
<ex><fex name="Body_part">My hands</fex> are <t>freezing</t>.</ex></def-root>
